Ingredients.5: 1 cup fat-free Greek yogurt (such as Fage®)

Ingredients.6: 0.25 cup garlic and herb cheese spread (such as Boursin®)

Directions.1: Preheat an air fryer to 330 degrees F (165 degrees C). Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray and set aside.

Directions.2: Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl. Add yogurt and mix with a fork until well combined.

Directions.3: Dust a work surface with flour. Remove dough from the bowl, and knead until no longer sticky, about 12 times. Add a little bit more flour if necessary.

Directions.4: Evenly divide dough into 8 pieces and flatten into circles with the palm of your hand. Place 1/2 tablespoon cheese spread in the center of each circle. Pull up the edges of the dough to cover the cheese, roll into a ball, and pinch the seams closed.

Directions.5: Brush each bagel bite with egg white and sprinkle with bagel seasoning.

Directions.6: Transfer bagel bites, seam sides down, into the prepared air fryer basket. Do not overcrowd. Depending on the size of your air fryer, you may have to do 2 batches.

Directions.7: Air fry until golden, 10 to 12 minutes. Remove bagel bites from the basket, and cool for about 10 minutes before serving.
